overview: In 1970, the writer Michael Scharang asked 6 workers in a Viennese flat-share about their dreams and hopes. Now, 30 years later, his daughter meets those people again.
tagline: In 1970, the writer Michael Scharang asked 6 workers in a Viennese flat-share about their dreams and hopes. Now, 30 years later, his daughter meets those people again.
title: Normale Zeiten
